articles.title: Samantha's EMOTIONAL chat on Shaakuntalam, battling myositis, bodyshaming, trolls & judgment - Bollywood Bubble
articles.description: Several labels have been attached to Samantha Ruth Prabhu but for us, she will always be a warrior princess. Much like her character in her next film Shaakun...
